title: Ngai ru Van mi tlangau chu
lyrics:
Ngai r'u, Van mi tlangau chu,
Lalber thar a lo piang ta;
Lei chungah remna leng se,
Pathian leh mihring remna,
Hnam tinreng lawma auvin,
Van mi zai mawi chu zawmin,
Ram tin kil tin puang zel r'u.
Lal Krista lo pian thu chu.
Van mi tlangau chu ngai r'u,
"Lalber thar a lo piang ta."

Krista chatuan Lal ropui,
Van mi thianghlimte fak chu;
Leiah hringmi chun vuanin.
Kan sual vanga tuar tur chu,
Van ropuinate hlipin.
Kan zinga'n a lo piang ta,
Lei leh vanah thang chhuak se,
Kan zinga Pathian thleng hi.
Van mi tlangau chu ngai r'u,
"Lalber thar a lo piang ta."
